content:
April 25. 1962 File Ref. MSA-33.4
Captain Ralph Bent Tainan Air Base Tainan, Taiwan
Dear Captain:
Enclosed herewith are two 695 forms, covering: Cleaner, Steam, Stock # 693-2646 and Demounter, Tire, Stock # 244-4898
Inasmuch as I am leaving for the States in a couple more days, it is impossible to hand-carry between Linkou and Tainan, as I did in the past.
Will you please have these forms signed and return necessary copies to Shu Lin Kou Air Base. Also, when you have the 1149 forms prepared, please have same signed as being received by me and forward the two necessary copies to Mr. Potter, P/SP-AID/C. Taipei, so that he may execute the purchase order covering. Date of my authorized signature should be 24 April.
Copies of this letter and covering correspondence will be sent to CUSA, Second Division and to P/SP to ensure correct "final allocation' data records.
It has been a wonderful experience, knowing, and working with you and your people. Never a time when one could not find perfect cooperation and courtesy. Tainan Air Base will be one of the many things I am going to miss, in the future.
My regards to all and the best of everything.
GEO/ks Enel. ce: CUSA P/SP - AID
Very truly yours. THE J. G. WHITE ENGINEERING CORPORATION
Original signed by G. B. OTTO G. E. Otte Spec. Writer & Bld Analyst
√Öendemin Ilisterich
445

Enclosed herewith are two 695 forms, covering: Cleaner, Steam, Stock # 693-2646 and Demounter, Tire, Stock # 244-4898
Inasmuch as I am leaving for the States in a couple more days, it is impossible to hand-carry between Linkou and Tainan, as I did in the past.

Will you please have these forms signed and return necessary copies to Shu Lin Kou Air Base. Also, when you have the 1149 forms prepared, please have same signed as being received by me and forward the two necessary copies to Mr. Potter, P/SP-AID/C. Taipei, so that he may execute the purchase order covering. Date of my authorized signature should be 24 April.
Copies of this letter and covering correspondence will be sent to CUSA, Second Division and to P/SP to ensure correct "final allocation' data records.

It has been a wonderful experience, knowing, and working with you and your people. Never a time when one could not find perfect cooperation and courtesy. Tainan Air Base will be one of the many things I am going to miss, in the future.
